column3: “Amazing taste and loved the way it burned , very drowsy eyes and great before bed , helped with my insomnia. In my top 3 for indica choices for sure.”

“Looooooooovvveeee this indica!! Heavy hitter, did not disappoint. Great for my neck pain, my IBS, and my anxiety. Momma say knock you out! 

 ....Kinda made me want to get a face tattoo, too, after a few bowls :-P”

“my new favorite  (for now)...went for Snoops Dream...was intrigued by the Tyson and am a HUGE indica-grrrrl...THE BEST for my specific needs...insomnia and a touch of depression...I couldn't be more jazzed to have found this gem”

“wow Mama Said Knock You Out I have problems sleeping I also suffer from severe seizures while I try and sleep so I decided to try a few different sativas but the Tyson was by far my favorite I went from 22 seizures a week down to 9 a week so I am very satisfied”
“Best sleep weed I have ever had the pleasure of smoking. This is is also a strain pretty much only for everyday users it's pretty dank stuff.👍👍”

“Just got some of this beautiful Indica recently and I am completely in love with it. I know that sounds weird but it's true. I have always been an Indica fan so I have sampled many, but this beats them all by a mile or ten. I have Crohn's disease and Tyson knocks it out cold and makes me feel happy and positive like I am not sick at all. If you need pain relief, appetite stimulation, sleep, muscle relaxation or mood ...”
“I made the mistake of trying this during a hike after a week long break from smoking. everything got insanely bright I couldn't see so I had to get one buds to guide me the rest of the way.”

“I'm an Indica guy and this strain is by far the most effective for my pain and discomfort. Mr. Tysons taste, smell and effect are 100% spot on for my needs. Though it's tough to find sometimes it's well worth the search!”
“The Best! Really knock u out.”
“AAA DANK INDICA, loved it 10/10”
“I put this up there with granddaddy purple, nice and very euphorically...”
“An amazing strain with quite exceptional properties like muscle relaxing and a clean cerebral high. A definite must try for any cannabis connoisseur. not recommended for novice smokers.”
“This is a knockout / couch-lock indica, great for pain and sleeplessness. All around AAA+ strain.”
“This is my favorite strain from cannaclinic, taste and smell is amazing especially when you squish it into rosin, the taste is so powerful, more tasty then the tyson shatter i had”
“First whiff and I could smell diesel. This diesel isn't as sour but heavy aroma none the less. Smoke is thick and smooth. Be prepared to chisel yourself into a statue.”

“It took me awhile to clue into why it was called Tyson.... but then it hit me :P I normally frequently wake at night because of post traumatic symptoms but this helped me stay asleep and I woke up refreshed not groggy. It would be good for anxiety for daytime use too. Really mellow.”
“Nice. What one would expect when paying for premium flower. Potent. Each pull is a nice punch. Slightly harsh but again, the name suits the strain. Nice relaxing feel and not too sleepy.”
“i want to say thank you guys for the Tyson Og kush”
“I keep forgetting to confirm the potency! It feeeeels like the first tiiiime!”
“KnockOut! Good and strong indica strain”
“This stuff is the best sleep aid! Taste slightly like potpourri upon exhale and slowly relaxes both mind and body until you drift into euphoria 🙊💭”
“great indica.  awesome taste and super potent.”
“Great pain relief,  focused,  euphoric, relaxed. Great strain!”
“I just grabbed some more tyson!   Knock out time lol”
“Dank. Had my eyes closed after 2 minutes.”
“Absolute fave”
“I have a pretty high tolerance, and I took a hit out of my bong and decided to stop and feel this out in stages. A sat down and started watching tv and after 3 minutes I'm blown as fuck”
“Tyson is a heavy hitting, body numbing Indica which is very sticky. Good for sleeping and takes care of anxiety nicely.”

“This strain was very effective for severe pain relief in my ankle. Not usually an indica person but I found that it did not make me sleepy or drowsy. Very nice strain with a classically strong Indica flavour.”

“Can hardly believe the beautiful crystals and tri cones on this one just looks like it was dipped in crystals absolutely amazing, very nice hitting indica was able to continue what I was doing pain free in the neck and back. Extremely tasty too very green tasting and powerful tasting terps.”
“very good strain”

“The description explains this strain perfectly.  I wouldn't recommend it for social anxiety because it made be a bit paranoid in public.  Otherwise love this 
strain for stress and pain and sleep.”
“First whiff and I could smell diesel. This diesel isn't as sour but heavy aroma none the less. Smoke is thick and smooth. Be prepared to chisel yourself into a statue.”
“my buddy and i are experienced cannabis eficinados and let me tell you, we were higher than kite. cant remember being that high for a long time. 10/10 will smoke again.”
“Personally, I found that this strain of cannabis works perfectly for those who are stressed out and/or having trouble sleeping.”

“Great strain overall, smells very potent, looks even more so. Caked in crystals, color was bright and nugs looked frosted, and had a nice density to it.

Felt nice and relaxed during these times, but sometimes would make me feel a little burned out after smoking too much. Easy problem to avoid, though.”
“what a strain.”
“Tyson is good shatter,  helps me sleep 72%.”
“The name says it all. The taste is like a bowl of grape fruity pebbles with a earthy exhale. The effects are super mind relaxing and perfect for a long day after work!”
“Mama Said Knock You Out!”
“very strong. I keep falling asleep. not much of a taste or smell. slow burn”
